name: Alchemist Dungeon
description:
The young alchemist girl Annelle, on the orders of the Dark Amethyst guild, sets off in search of a philosopher's stone, which can turn any metal into gold. The abandoned alchemists' dungeon, located near the Gelbin city, where rumors are about the numerous riches stored inside, indicated its location. However, the people who went there didn't return, but even this didn't stop Annelle. Having reached the dungeon and going into it, Annel was locked inside...

Key features:
  • Explore randomly generated dungeon (Yeah, yeah, that's a roguelike game)
  • Combine 4 ingredients in any way to create 60+ helpful potions
  • Upgrade your magical runes with 8 gems as you need
  • Avoid different traps. Also, beware of gas
